snippet: From Washington to Bangkok, readers wax nostalgic about The International Herald Tribune, which was rebranded this week as The International New York Times.
lead_paragraph: From Washington to Bangkok, readers wax nostalgic about The International Herald Tribune, which was rebranded this week as The International New York Times.

headline.main: Remembering The Herald Tribune in Its Glory Days
headline.print_headline: Remembering The Herald Tribune in Its Glory Days
